amendment.description: Amendment strikes the olive oil import restriction contained in Section 10010 of the bill.
amendment.purpose: An amendment No. 44 printed in Part B of House Report 113-117 to strike the olive oil import restriction contained in Section 10010 of the bill.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Gibson amendment (A038) Agreed to by recorded vote: 343 - 81, 1 Present (Roll no. 273).

action.text: Amendment agreed to Committee of the Whole
